name: ExclusiveGesture
desc: A gesture that consists of two gestures where only one of them can succeed.

items.name: init(First, Second)
items.desc: Creates a gesture from two gestures where only one of them succeeds.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of gesture representing the body of Self.

items.name: enum Value
items.desc: The value of an exclusive gesture that indicates which of two gestures succeeded.

declaration: @frozen struct ExclusiveGesture<First, Second> where First : Gesture, Second : Gesture
